signContent: Can you tell me how to get,
How to get to Sesame Street?
Welcome, traveler! You've found your way to the friendliest
street in all the realms. Here you'll find:
- The Furry Arms Tavern (west from here)
- The Snuggly Sleeper Hotel (north, then west)
- Count's Fountain for healing (south, then east)
- The Wumpie Colosseum for pit fighting (west, south, south)
Check the MAP SIGN for a detailed layout of the area.
Enjoy your stay, and remember: Be kind to the Wumpies!
